value.title: Download your reports from the Power Bi service (powerbi.com) - Power BI Tips & Tricks #19
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you Microsoft's latest functionality added to the Power BI service (Powerbi.com). value.title: Convert data from HTML to Plain Text using Power Query for Power BI Table Visualization
value.excerpt: As we all know, Power BI table visualization does not support HTML generation. So, we need to convert our HTML text to Plain text.   With the help of Power Query function, we can easily remove HTML tags from the Text in Power Query. To implement that we need to use function HTML.table() in Power Query.
